name: Attack
desc: [Reduces enemy HP]

name: Block
desc: Until next turn, prevents damage.

name: Barricade
desc: [Block is not removed at the start of the turn.]
enemy: Block is not removed at the start of its turn.

name: Channel
desc: Channeling an Orb puts it into your first empty slot. If you have no more empty slots, your first Orb is automatically Evoked to make room.

name: Confused
desc: Whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost.

name: Ethereal
desc: If this card is in your hand at the end of turn, it is exhausted. Exhausted cards are removed from your deck until the end of combat.

name: Evoke
desc: Consume your rightmost Orb and use its Evoke effect.

name: Exhaust
desc: Removed until end of combat.

name: Fire Breathing
desc: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack played this turn.

name: Frost
desc: Orb: Gains Block.

name: Lightning
desc: Orb: Deals damage to random enemies.

name: Hex
desc: Whenever you play a non-Attack card, deal 1 damage for each Attack played this turn.

name: Innate
desc: Start each combat with this card in your hand.

name: Intangible
desc: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to 1 this turn. Intangible is reapplied every other turn.

name: Power
desc: [Power cards are cards that imbue your character with a beneficial effect.]

name: Strength
desc: Strength adds additional damage to attacks.

name: Thorns
desc: When receiving Attack damage, deals damage back.

name: Malleable
desc: Upon receiving damage, gains M Block. Block gain increases as Malleable is triggered. Resets to N at the start of your turn.

name: No Draw
desc: You cannot draw cards this turn.

name: Unplayable
desc: Unplayable cards cannot be played from your hand.

name: Upgrade
desc: Upgrading cards makes them more powerful. Cards can only be upgraded once.

name: Vulnerable
desc: Vulnerable creatures take 50% more damage from Attacks.

name: Weak
desc: Weakened creatures deal 25% less damage with Attacks.
